label: specifiedLogisticsStatus
comment: A status specified for this logistics transport movement.

domainIncludes.comment: The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.

A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee in a supply chain via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.,A referenced, separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.
